name: Earth-Life Science Institute
context: Research institute at Tokyo Tech investigating fundamental questions about life, intelligence, and consciousness.

contexts.text: Research institute at Tokyo Tech investigating fundamental questions about life, intelligence, and consciousness.
Research institute at Tokyo Institute of Technology studying origins of life and complexity

synthesized_overview: The Earth-Life Science Institute (ELSI) is a research institute at the Tokyo Institute of Technology dedicated to investigating fundamental questions about the origins of life, the emergence of complexity, intelligence, and consciousness. Through interdisciplinary study, the institute explores how life arose on Earth and the underlying principles governing the development of intelligent systems.
